captions.text: How beautiful, is this worldly life
But not a soul shall remain
We've all come into this world
Only to leave it one day
I can see that everything around me
Rises then fades away
Life is just a passing moment
Nothing is meant to stay, oh
This worldly life has an end
And it's then real life begins
A world where we will live forever
This beautiful worldly life has an end
It's just a bridge that must be crossed
To a life that will go on forever
So many years, quickly slipping by
Like the Sleepers of the Cave
Wake up and make a choice
Before we end up in our graves
O God! You didn't put me here in vain
I know I'll be held accountable for what I do
This life is just a journey
And it's taking me back to You
This worldly life has an end
And it's then real life begins
A world where we will live forever
This beautiful worldly life has an end
It's just a bridge that must be crossed
To a life that will go on forever
So many get caught in this beautiful web
Its gardens become an infatuation
But surely they'll understand at the final stop
That its gardens are meant for cultivation, oh
This worldly life has an end
And it's then real life begins
A world where we will live forever
This beautiful worldly life has an end
It's just a bridge that must be crossed
To a life that will go on forever
This worldly life has an end
And it's then real life begins
A world where we will live forever
This beautiful worldly life has an end
It's just a bridge that must be crossed
To a life that will go on forever

title: Maher Zain - This Worldly Life (Dunya) | Official Lyric video

comments.author: zohra 17

comments.text:
ALAIKUM SALAM.
  What about the songs which remind Allah. I understand and agree with you. 
However, Messenger of ALlah (peace upon him) says that do not make hard, 
make it easy. If some people remember Allah, Messenger of him (p.o.h.), or 
some realities, it can be perfect. I know you are sensitive and it is good 
for you. The most sensitive man is Muhammed (p.o.h.). However, he did not 
obligate the people what he has done(p.o.h.). I think some thinks are based 
on niyyah and we should not turn off sources lights. Some songs like this 
have potantial to wonder about Islam for people. And you should think about 
Messenger's (p.o.h.) this sentece. Causing faith of someone is better than 
anyting else in this world. AS SALAMU ALAIKUM
comments.author: lilly askar

comments.text:
+Fatima Ahmad  

AS SALAMU ALAIKUM

not every music is haraam in Islam  only those music or songs which harms 
people or hurt feelings is haram...good music is allowed in Islam like the 
people of habasha used to celebrated the eid using tamboreens in prophet 
house itself and describing the bravery of habasha people....

When our RASOOL ALLAH SALLAL LAHU ALAIHI WA SALLAM migrated from MECCA 
towards MEDINA the SAHABAS welcomed him by singing this nasheed >>>>" TALA 
AL BADRU ALAINA MIN SANI DAAIL WADAE" and womens girls used to clap and 
children mens raise voices of YA RASOOL ALLAH .

those music and songs are HARAAM which makes u forget ALLAH and RASOOL 
ALLAH.....ANYTHING which brings closer towards ALLAH and RASOOL ALLAH is 
considered legal
...

Islam is full of freedome and love we just have to understand it and every 
deeds value is depend upon intention....

drinking alchohol makes a person unpure and unconsious which will take him 
away from the rememberance of almighty ALLAH


 if i built even a masjid but with the intention to create hate and 
division among muslims then even building the masjid is HARAM like " masjid 
al zaraar"  mentioned in quran which built my munafiqs....﻿

AS SALAMU ALAIKUM
comments.author: shimar khan

comments.text:
+shimar khan
No, in this case ti doesn't. If Allah says alcohol is haram, you cannot 
drink and say its based on your niyyah. Niyyah is very important aspect 
when doing an action but when Allah says it is forbidden we should follow 
him. Assalamualaikum brother.
comments.author: Fatima Ahmad
